case_title: Sardar MUHAMMAD RASHID KHAN vs AZAD JAMMU AND KASHMIR COUNCIL through Secretary, AJ&K Council Secretariat, Islamabad and 4 others
court_name: Azad Jammu and Kashmir Service Tribunal
respondents: AZAD JAMMU AND KASHMIR COUNCIL through Secretary, AJ&K Council Secretariat, Islamabad and 4 others

key_points.tribunal_jurisdiction: Cannot issue directions; can only confirm, set aside, vary, or modify orders appealed against.
key_points.legal_basis: Section 4 and Section 5 of the Service Tribunals Act, 1973
key_points.promotion_claim: Promotion is not a vested right and cannot be claimed retrospectively.
key_points.reason_for_dismissal: No departmental order challenged; ambiguous and vague claim.
